Qualified tenderers are suppliers capable of fulfilling this technical services outsourcing project pursuant to the Government Procurement Act and Article 3 of the Regulations for Selection and Fee Calculation of Technical Services Providers Entrusted by Entities (the term “technical services” referred to in the Regulations is defined as planning, design, supervision, management or other services provided by architecture firms, technician companies, technical consulting firms and other natural persons or corporations eligible to provide technical services according to law).2. Joint tendering is not allowed in this project. The task force participating in this project must at least comprise the following professional personnel, and no concurrent positions shall be held by the same person. The following personnel must be currently employed by Party B.(1) Station chief: a specialized person with at least a vocational high school diploma in electrical engineering, machinery or relevant fields, or at least a Class C technician certificate, or at least three years of experience in work related to the nature of this project(2) Mechanical and electrical maintenance technician: four or more specialized personnel with at least a vocational high school diploma in electrical engineering, machinery or relevant fields, or at least a Class C technician certificate, or at least one year of experience in work related to the nature of this project(3) Computer operator: an operator with at least a high school diploma or its equivalent who is familiar with typing and Microsoft Office or has at least one year of experience in work related to the nature of this project3. See the service outsourcing project instructions for more details.[Method of contract award]: Based on the total price. The evaluation date will be set separately. The principle of contract award is to select winners during the evaluation and carry out price negotiations in sequential order.[Amount of bid bond]: Bid bond is not required for service procurement.[Others]:1.
